exceptions.tactic: intros this W A s p P H always_safe sc.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
s: state
p: proc A
P: state -> proc A -> Prop

Goal:
always s p P -> forall sc : schedule, safe p sc s

Premises:
safe : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> schedule -> state -> Prop
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc A | Ret : A -> proc A | Act : action W A this -> proc A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc B -> (B -> proc A) -> proc A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc A -> proc A | WithInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc A -> proc A Arguments proc [this W] _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [this W] [A]%type_scope [V K
nid = nat : Set
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
Inductive schedule : Set := ActStep : schedule | SeqRet : schedule | SeqStep : schedule -> schedule | InjectStep : schedule -> schedule | InjectRet : schedule | WithInvStep : schedule -> schedule | WithInvRet : schedule
always : forall A : Type, state -> proc A -> (state -> proc A -> Prop) -> Prop
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
alw_safe' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p (sc :: scs) P -> safe p sc s
alw_coh : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> s \In coherent
proc_progress : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule), s \In Coh W -> safe p sc s -> good p sc -> exists (s' : state) (p' : proc A), pstep s p sc s' p'
alw_coh' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p scs P -> s \In coherent
proc_ind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> Prop), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
proc_rec : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> Set), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
proc_rect : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> Type), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
proc_sind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> SProp), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
pstep_safe : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A), pstep s1 t sc s2 q -> safe t sc s1
schedule_ind : forall P : schedule -> Prop, P ActStep -> P SeqRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (SeqStep s)) -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (InjectStep s)) -> P InjectRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (WithInvStep s)) -> P WithInvRet -> forall s : schedule, P s
schedule_rec : forall P : schedule -> Set, P ActStep -> P SeqRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (SeqStep s)) -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (InjectStep s)) -> P InjectRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (WithInvStep s)) -> P WithInvRet -> forall s : schedule, P s
schedule_rect : forall P : schedule -> Type, P ActStep -> P SeqRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (SeqStep s)) -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (InjectStep s)) -> P InjectRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (WithInvStep s)) -> P WithInvRet -> forall s : schedule, P s
schedule_sind : forall P : schedule -> SProp, P ActStep -> P SeqRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (SeqStep s)) -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (InjectStep s)) -> P InjectRet -> (forall s : schedule, P s -> P (WithInvStep s)) -> P WithInvRet -> forall s : schedule, P s
pstep : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc A -> schedule -> state -> proc A -> Prop
step : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc A -> schedule -> state -> proc A -> Prop
always_sc : forall A : Type, state -> proc A -> seq schedule -> (state -> proc A -> Prop) -> Prop
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc A | Ret : A -> proc A | Act : action W A this -> proc A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc B -> (B -> proc A) -> proc A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc A -> proc A | WithInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc A -> proc A Arguments proc [this W] _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [this W] [A]%type_scope [V K] Arguments WithInv [this W] [A]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
WithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc A -> proc A
Seq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc B -> (B -> proc A) -> proc A
Actions.skip_step : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.skip_safe W s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
Inject : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc A -> proc A
pstep_network_sem : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A), pstep s1 t sc s2 q -> network_step W this s1 s2
stepSeq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc B) (k : B -> proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A), pstep s1 (Seq t k) sc s2 q < -> (exists v : B, [/\ sc = SeqRet, t = Ret v, q = k v, s2 = s1 & s1 \In Coh W]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (p' : proc B), [/\ sc = SeqStep sc', q = Seq p' k & pstep s1 t sc' s2 p'])
Ret : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), A -> proc A
good : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> schedule -> Prop
Actions.send_act_safe : world -> forall p : protocol, nid -> Label -> send_trans (coh p) -> seq nat -> nid -> state -> Prop
Actions.safe_local : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall s : state, Actions.skip_safe W s -> coh p (getStatelet s l)
Act : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), action W A this -> proc A
pstep_inv : forall (this : nid) (A : Type) (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s1 s2 : state) (sc : schedule) (t t' : proc A), s1 \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> pstep s1 t sc s2 t' -> s2 \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))
pcat : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc A -> (A -> Pred (proc B)) -> Simpl_Pred (proc B)
skip_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> Actions.action W V this
Actions.skip_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> Actions.action W V this
stepWithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s1 : state) (t : proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A) (pf : W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)), pstep s1 (WithInv pr I ii pf t) sc s2 q < -> (exists v : A, [/\ sc = WithInvRet, t = Ret v, q = Ret v, s2 = s1, s1 \In Coh W & W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (t' : proc A), [/\ sc = WithInvStep sc', q = WithInv pr I ii pf t', W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii), s1 \In Coh W & pstep s1 t sc' s2 t'])
Actions.can_send = fun (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s : state) => (l \in dom s) && (this \in nodes p (getStatelet s l)) : protocol -> nid -> Label -> state -> bool
stepAct : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (a : action W A this) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (t : proc A), pstep s1 (Act a) sc s2 t < -> (exists (v : A) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), [/\ sc = ActStep, t = Ret v & a_step pf s2 v])
stepInject : forall (this : nid) (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (em : injects V W K) (s1 : state) (t : proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A), pstep s1 (Inject em t) sc s2 q < -> (exists (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (v : A), [/\ sc = InjectRet, t = Ret v, q = Ret v, s2 = s1 & extends em s1 s1']) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (t' : proc A) (s1' s2' s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), [/\ sc = InjectStep sc', q = Inject em t', s1 = s1' \+ s, s2 = s2' \+ s, s1 \In Coh W & pstep s1' t sc' s2' t'])
ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop), ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I -> Protocols.protocol
ProtocolWithIndInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop), ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I -> Protocols.protocol
stepUnfin : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (t : proc A), pstep s1 Unfinished sc s2 t < -> False
iffRL : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> Q -> P

``` 
intros this W A s p P H always_safe sc. 
induction H; intros sc; unfold safe; intros Hs;
- apply (alw_safe' _ _ _ _ _ _ P) with (sc :: nil);
  + assumption.
  + apply H.
  + constructor.
- apply (alw_safe' _ _ _ _ _ _ P) with (sc :: nil);
  + assumption.
  + apply H.
  + constructor.
- apply (alw_safe' _ _ _ _ _ _ P) with (sc :: nil);
  + assumption.
  + apply H.
  + constructor.
- apply (alw_safe' _ _ _ _ _ _ P) with (sc :: sc0 :: scs);
  + assumption.
  + apply Hs.
  + assumption.
```

original: intros this W A s p P H always_safe sc.
